details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.4.5 Fonts - 8.4.5.7 Character encodings - cmaps in the symbolic TrueType font program
details.description: The 'cmap' subtable in the embedded font program shall either contain the Microsoft Symbol (3,0 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0) or the Mac Roman (1,0 – Platform ID=1, Encoding ID=1) encoding

rule.description: The 'cmap' subtable in the embedded font program shall either contain the Microsoft Symbol (3,0 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0) or the Mac Roman (1,0 – Platform ID=1, Encoding ID=1) encoding
rule.test: isSymbolic == false || cmap30Present == true || cmap10Present == true

error.message: The embedded font program for a symbolic TrueType font does not contain Microsoft Symbol (3,0 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=0) or the Mac Roman (1,0 – Platform ID=1, Encoding ID=0) encoding
